You are here:

SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
VISUALFORCE B2B COMMERCE
Filter Information in the My Account Page by Effective Account

When you enable effective accounts, determine how you want to scope the information shown in the My Account page. You can filter all sections of the My Account page to show only the information that applies to a currently selected effective account. Alternatively, for some sections of the My Account page, you can show information from all effective accounts that the buyer can access.

REQUIRED EDITIONS AND USER PERMISSIONS

Salesforce Compatibility

Salesforce Classic (not available in all orgs) and Lightning Experience for Enterprise, Performance, Unlimited, and Developer editions.




B2B Commerce Compatibility

B2B Commerce for Visualforce Winter ’21 (version 4.13)
B2B Commerce for Visualforce Spring ’20 (version 4.12)
B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’19 (version 4.11)
B2B Commerce for Visualforce Spring ’19 (version 4.10)
B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’18 (version 4.9)


USER PERMISSIONS NEEDED
To access CC Admin and change settings:	Access B2B Commerce for Visualforce Admin Settings permission set

Which user experience do you want to implement? Review the following summary to understand the impact of showing an effective account's information in the My Account page.

SECTION OF THE MY ACCOUNT PAGE	WHEN SHOWING AN EFFECTIVE ACCOUNT	WHEN CONTINUING TO SHOW THE BUYER'S ASSIGNED ACCOUNT (DEFAULT)
Contact Information	Shows the account, contact, and user record details for the selected effective account.	Shows the account, contact, and user record details for the buyer.
Change Password	Shows controls for changing the buyer's password. An effective account doesn't change this section's behavior.	Shows controls for changing the buyer's password.
Manage Address Book	Shows the billing and shipping addresses for the selected effective account.	Shows the billing and shipping addresses for the buyer's assigned account.
My Carts	Shows carts for only the selected effective account.	Shows all carts from all effective accounts that the buyer can access, regardless of which effective account is selected.
My Orders	Show orders for only the selected effective account.	Shows all orders from all effective accounts that the buyer can access, regardless of which effective account is selected.
My Templates	Shows wish lists for only the selected effective account.	Shows all wish lists from all effective accounts that the buyer can access, regardless of which effective account is selected.
My Subscriptions	Shows subscriptions for only the selected effective account.	Shows all subscriptions from all effective accounts that the buyer can access, regardless of which effective account is selected.
My Wallet	Shows stored payments for only the selected effective account.	Shows all stored payments from all effective accounts that the buyer can access, regardless of which effective account is selected.
My Invoices	Shows invoices for only the selected effective account.	Shows all invoices from all effective accounts that the buyer can access, regardless of which effective account is selected.

To filter sections of the My Account page for the selected effective account, update your storefront configuration settings.

On the CC Admin tab in your org, select your storefront (1).
In the Storefront Settings menu, select Configuration Settings (2).
From the Module picklist, select My Account (3).
Find the Filter Effective Account configuration (4), and check its value (5).
TIP
If the value is FALSE, click Override in the Action column. Enter TRUE for Value, and click Create.
If the configuration doesn't exist, click New , enter the following values in the New Page Setting window, and click Create.
FIELD	VALUE
Module	My Account
Configuration	Filter Effective Account
Page	My Account
Value	TRUE
To filter the My Orders section, update a separate storefront configuration setting.
TIP
From the Module picklist, select My Orders (6).
Find the Filter Effective Account configuration (7) and make sure that its value is TRUE (8).
TIP
If the value is FALSE, click Override in the Action column. Enter TRUE for Value, and click Create.
If the configuration doesn't exist, click New , enter the following values in the New Page Setting window, and click Create.
FIELD	VALUE
Module	My Orders
Configuration	Filter Effective Account
Page	My Account
Value	TRUE
To filter the My Templates section for the selected effective account, update a separate storefront configuration setting.
TIP
From the Module picklist, select Wishlists/Templates (9).
Find the Filter Effective Account configuration (10) and check its value (11).
TIP
If the value is FALSE, click Override in the Action column. Enter TRUE for Value, and click Create.
If the configuration doesn't exist, click New , enter the following values in the New Page Setting window, and click Create.
FIELD	VALUE
Module	Wishlists/Templates
Configuration	Filter Effective Account
Page	My Account
Value	TRUE
Build and activate a new configuration cache.

title: Filtering My Account Page by Effective Account
